name: Antenna Uncle
description:
Adjust TV antenna to find different TV channels and satisfy the whole family during a TV evening. Best played with our proprietary 'アンテナ360 4-axis Analog Antenna Controller', but can also be played with Xbox Pad with 2 analog sticks.

MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR LIMA GAME JAM 2018 #LGJ2018 BY

  • Paweł Piskorski @CptSub
  • Jakub Ziembiński @terramyx
  • Justyna Król
  • Valerie Williams
  • Enrique Klein @eeklein

Additional music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), Scott Buckley (scottbuckley.com.au) and Ithaca Audio Ltd (ithacaaudio.com)

26-28.01.2018, Lima, Peru
